articles.content: There, he excelled as dimension-hopping baddie Kaecilius, opposite Benedict Cumberbatchs Stephen Strange. Even for Marvel, Doctor Strange was a pretty wigged-out experience  the hero is a dashing sur… [+1620 chars]

articles.author: Steven Brown
articles.title: BBC is a ‘failing organisation!’ Britons warned it's time to stop paying BBC licence fee - Express
articles.description: THE BBC has been accused of being a 'failing organisation' and Britons have been urged to stop paying the licence fee.
